name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XAD Client for CRM New Version

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XAD Client for CRM New Version

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to XAD Extension
XAD (client-site addon) Chrome Extension is Computer Telephony Integrations (CTI) Agent Desktop Application for CRM(s) integration (Freshdesk, Freshsales, Salesforce, Zendesk) specially designed for Call Center Agent/Contact Center Agent. Using for Windows, Linux and MacOS.
How does it work?
- Go to the Chrome web store, search for the XAD keyword then add it to your chrome.
- Login into XAD Extension with your individual call center account.
- Receive incoming calls and provides caller identification feature (screen pop-up) via your CRM application.
- Click on a phone number and make a call.
- Make outgoing calls via the call
- All your calls will automatically get logged and recorded in your XAD account.
- More features: Agent Information, Pause (with reasons list), Unpause, Show Call Waiting (CW), Logout.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.4.0.0
- Upgrade XAD extension system.
- Upgrade to the latest version of SocketIO.
- Integrate Webpack into the extension.
v2.3.02.02
- Update some errors that arise for the calling feature via Zalo.

- Fix agent login error with previously configured CRM.

- Update more customer information displayed on CRM Zendesk.

v2.3.01.04

v2.2.12.21

v2.2.09.19
- Change get config from the file to the options page.
v2.2.06.10
- Update manifest version 2 to manifest version 3.
